title: Dumbarton 0-5 Falkirk: Match Report
text: Dumbarton 0-5 Falkirk: Match Report 24 Oct 2015 17:01:00 John Baird hits three as Falkirk thrash DumbartonJohn Baird was a hat-trick hero as Falkirk crushed Dumbarton 5-0 at the Cheaper Insurance Direct Stadium.Peter Houston's men hit the front in the first five minutes when Baird rounded the goalkeeper to score from a fine pass by Lee Miller.Baird scored a similar goal midway through the half, this time courtesy of a Mark Kerr pass.Craig Sibbald fed Bob McHugh to drive home and put the match beyond the Sons before half-time.Baird terrorised the hosts throughout, and grabbed his third from another well-weighted pass by Kerr. Blair Alston rounded off the scoring from a Sibbald pass, as Dumbarton's dismal run continued. Related Sport News
